meanings.sent1: During the competition, she outshoots all her opponents effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: He always outshoots his friends in target practice.
meanings.sent3: The young archer outshoots the old champion, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outshoot her own record is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The sun outshoots the clouds, shining brightly in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The tree's outshoots provide shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The plant's outshoots spread wide, reaching for the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The outshoots of the bush create a natural barrier in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Each outshoot of the vine seems to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The outshoots of the tree sway gracefully in the wind.
